item.title: 捷克经济增长低于预期，出口依然疲软
item.description: 由于家庭消费持续复苏，但对主要市场（尤其是德国）的出口仍然疲软，捷克经济在第三季度的增长低于预期。【原文：The Czech economy expanded less than expected in the third quarter as household consumption continued to recover but exports to key markets, most notably Germany, remained weak.】

item.title: 沃尔沃入主 Northvolt 电池合资企业
item.description: 沃尔沃汽车公司（Volvo Car AB）正在接管与陷入财务困境的 Northvolt AB 公司的合资企业，在瑞典西海岸建造一座工厂，这凸显了电动汽车市场在扩大电池生产规模方面面临的重大挑战。【原文：Volvo Car AB is taking over a joint venture with financially struggling Northvolt AB to build a factory on Sweden’s west coast, underscoring the major challenges of scaling battery production in the electric vehicle market.】

item.title: 英国贸易商期待里夫斯的预算案为特鲁斯时代划上句号
item.description: 英国交易商期待工党政府近 15 年来的首份预算能让投资者相信，英国再次成为他们资金的安全目的地。【原文：UK traders are looking to the Labour government’s first budget in almost 15 years to convince investors that Britain is once again a safe destination for their cash.】

item.title: 迪拜国际金融公司（DIFC）暂停与伊朗石油大亨有关联的公司业务
item.description: 迪拜国际金融中心已经暂停了多家公司的业务，熟悉内情的人士称，这些公司是伊朗石油交易商侯赛因-沙姆哈尼（Hossein Shamkhani）监管的网络的一部分。【原文：The Dubai International Financial Centre has suspended multiple companies that people familiar with the matter say are part of a network overseen by Iranian oil trader Hossein Shamkhani.】

item.title: 阿斯顿-马丁依靠成本控制帮助汽车制造商结束亏损
item.description: 阿斯顿-马丁拉贡达全球控股公司（Aston Martin Lagonda Global Holdings Plc）首席执行官阿德里安-霍尔马克（Adrian Hallmark）在这家豪华汽车制造商再次报告季度亏损后，承诺将加大成本削减力度。【原文：Aston Martin Lagonda Global Holdings Plc Chief Executive Officer Adrian Hallmark pledged to step up cost-cutting efforts after the luxury-car maker reported another quarterly loss.】

item.title: 庞大、笨重、纸张驱动—且难以破解
item.description:
Clear Ballot 的新型投票机表明，该行业对数字技术的应用是多么缓慢而稳定。【原文：

Clear Ballot’s new voting machines show just how slow and steady the industry’s incorporation of digital tech has been.

】

item.title: 戴蒙德认为美国银行整合是最佳投资机会
item.description: 巴克莱银行前首席执行官鲍勃-戴蒙德（Bob Diamond）认为，美国这个世界上最发达的银行业市场的整合是最大的投资机会。【原文：Former Barclays Plc Chief Executive Bob Diamond sees consolidation in the world’s most-developed banking market as the biggest investment opportunity in the US.】

item.title: 埃尔莫蒂称欧盟银行交易不应因国家利益而失败
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）首席执行官塞尔吉奥-埃尔莫蒂（Sergio Ermotti）表示，欧洲银行业市场需要整合，狭隘的政治偏好不应成为障碍。【原文：Europe’s banking market is in need of consolidation and narrow political preferences shouldn’t stand in the way, UBS Group AG Chief Executive Officer Sergio Ermotti said.】

item.title: 高盛警告看跌风险，欧洲天然气价格下滑
item.description: 由于高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：European natural gas fell as Goldman Sachs Group Inc. warned of downside risks to prices that have recently surged to this year’s high.】

item.title: 布鲁克菲尔德斥资 23 亿美元收购 Orsted 海上风电场股份
item.description: 布鲁克菲尔德公司以 17.5 亿英镑（23 亿美元）从 Orsted A/S 公司购买了四个海上风电场的股份，这是今年该行业最大的交易之一。【原文：Brookfield bought a £1.75 billion ($2.3 billion) stake in four offshore wind farms from Orsted A/S in one of the biggest deals for the sector this year.】

item.title: Investcorp 的中国支持基金启动三项中东交易
item.description: Investcorp Holdings 已通过一家新的投资公司签署了三项交易，该公司由中国主权财富基金支持，于今年早些时候成立，旨在寻找中东地区的投资机会。【原文：Investcorp Holdings has inked three deals through a new investment vehicle anchored by China’s sovereign wealth fund that was set up earlier this year to target opportunities within the Middle East.】

item.title: 马士基与中国隆基签订绿色船舶燃料供应协议
item.description: 航运巨头 A.P. Moller-Maersk A/S 公司与一家中国工厂达成了清洁生物甲醇的长期供应协议，这是该公司寻求低排放船用燃料的最新举措。【原文：Shipping giant A.P. Moller-Maersk A/S struck a long-term supply deal for cleaner bio-methanol from a Chinese facility, the latest iteration in its search for low-emission marine fuel.】

item.title: 新加坡金管局成立由前局长领导的新金融科技网络
item.description: 新加坡前央行行长拉维-梅农（Ravi Menon）正与他的前同事们在一个新的金融和技术网络重聚，该网络的计划包括为初创企业筹集资金。【原文：Singapore’s former central bank chief Ravi Menon is reuniting with his former colleagues at a new financial and technology network with plans including fund raising for startups.】

item.title: 马来西亚林吉特将创 2015 年以来最大单月跌幅
item.description: 由于对美国大选的担忧，投资者缩减了对风险资产的投资，马来西亚货币将迎来九年多来最糟糕的一个月。【原文：Malaysia’s currency is on course for its worst month in more than nine years, as investors scale back on risk assets amid concerns over the US election.】

item.title: 巴黎奥运会推动法国经济加速发展
item.description: 由于巴黎奥运会的推动力掩盖了拖累法国公共财政的潜在弱点，法国经济获得了增长势头。【原文：France’s economy gained momentum as a boost from the Paris Olympics papered over underlying weaknesses that are weighing on the country’s public finances.】

item.title: 英国 2024 年预算直播：里夫斯在首次预算演讲中准备加税
item.description: 10 月 28 日，在伦敦唐宁街，基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）在宣布工党新政府的首份预算案前与瑞秋-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）会面。摄影师：Hollie Adams/AFP/Getty Images【原文：Keir Starmer meets with Rachel Reeves before the announcement on the first budget of the new Labour government at Downing Street, in London, on Oct. 28. Photographer: Hollie Adams/AFP/Getty Images】

item.title: 京瓷计划出售 KDDI 股份以充实资金
item.description: 京瓷公司表示，计划在未来五年内出售其在日本第二大电信运营商 KDDI 公司中约三分之一的股份。【原文：Kyocera Corp. said it plans to sell down about one-third of its stake in Japan’s No. 2 telecom operator KDDI Corp. over the next five years.】

item.title: 美国比特币 ETF 的流入量位居第三，代币数量接近历史纪录
item.description: 投资于比特币的美国交易所交易基金出现了 8.7 亿美元的净流入，创下单日净流入额第三高，因为在对美国大选潜在结果的猜测中，比特币这一数字资产濒临历史最高点。【原文：US exchange-traded funds investing in Bitcoin saw an $870 million net inflow, their third-highest daily haul, as the digital asset flirts with a record high amid speculation about the potential outcome of the US election.】

item.title: 腾讯支持的 Airwallex 寻求融资，目标估值 60 亿美元
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，企业支付服务提供商 Airwallex 正在与投资者洽谈，希望在新一轮融资中筹集约 2 亿美元，为公司发展提供资金。【原文：Corporate payments service provider Airwallex is in talks with investors to raise about $200 million in a new funding round to finance its growth, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 西方投资者大量涌入，全球黄金需求突破 1000 亿美元
item.description: 据世界黄金协会（World Gold Council）称，全球黄金需求在第三季度增长了约5%，创下了同期的最高纪录，并首次将消费量提升到1000亿美元以上。【原文：Global gold demand swelled about 5% in the third quarter, setting a record for the period and lifting consumption above $100 billion for the first time, according to the World Gold Council.】

item.title: 在大田洋三疯狂的日本，交易员被禁止观看世界大赛
item.description: 据估计，日本有 12% 的人口将收看棒球巨星大谷翔平的首次世界大赛，但有一个群体却错过了，那就是无法通过手机或电视观看比赛的东京商人。【原文：As an estimated 12% of Japan’s population tunes in to watch baseball superstar Shohei Ohtani’s first World Series, one group is missing out: traders in Tokyo who can’t watch the games on their mobiles or on TV.】

item.title: 瑞银业绩超预期，银行警告美国投票风险
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）公布的第三季度财报大体超出预期，但同时警告称将面临从美国大选到利息收入下降等各种不利因素。【原文：UBS Group AG posted third quarter results that broadly beat expectations, while warning of headwinds ranging from the US elections to falling interest income.】

item.title: GQG Partners 出于风险管理考虑减持英伟达股份
item.description: GQG Partners LLC 投资组合经理布莱恩-科斯曼克（Brian Kersmanc）表示，作为其风险管理策略的一部分，GQG Partners LLC 已经削减了对英伟达公司股票的投资。【原文：GQG Partners LLC has trimmed its exposure to Nvidia Corp.’s stock as part of its risk management strategy, according to portfolio manager Brian Kersmanc.】

item.title: 美国大选前，"特朗普大获全胜 "备忘录股票在中国大涨
item.description: 在距离美国总统大选不到一周的时间里，中国投资者纷纷涌入一只名不见经传的股票，这只股票的名字听起来就像 "特朗普大获全胜"。【原文：Chinese investors are jumping into a little-known stock whose name sounds like “Trump wins big” less than a week before the US presidential election.】

item.title: 锂矿开采商皮尔巴拉矿业公司将停止澳大利亚工厂的生产
item.description: 锂矿开采商皮尔巴拉矿业有限公司（Pilbara Minerals Ltd.）正在暂停其位于西澳大利亚皮尔冈戈拉（Pilgangoora）项目的恩贡加朱（Ngungaju）加工厂的产量，因为价格下滑对该行业造成了挤压。【原文：Lithium miner Pilbara Minerals Ltd. is suspending output from its Ngungaju processing plant at the Pilgangoora project in Western Australia, as a price downturn squeezes the sector.】

item.title: 印尼将前部长列为食糖腐败案嫌疑人
item.description: 印尼前贸易部长托马斯-伦邦（Thomas Lembong）是政府的强烈批评者，他被列为 2015 年一起涉及食糖进口的腐败案的嫌疑人，有人认为此举可能出于政治动机。【原文：Former Indonesian Trade Minister Thomas Lembong, a strong critic of the government, has been named a suspect in a corruption case involving sugar imports back in 2015, a move that some say may be politically motivated.】

item.title: 特朗普交易— 比特币是老大，债券处于亏损状态
item.description:
加密货币搭上了 "特朗普获胜 "的顺风车，但从经济数据和麦迪逊广场花园集会中却出现了相反的说法。【原文：

Crypto is along for the ‘Trump-wins’ ride, but a counter-narrative is emerging from economic data and the Madison Square Garden rally.

】

item.title: 资金撤离沪深 300 指数，中国新指数 ETF 吸引资金流入
item.description: 一批追踪中国新 A500 指数的交易所交易基金在推出两周内出现了强劲的资金流入，显示出人们对这一新基准的兴趣持续升温。【原文：A cohort of exchange-traded funds tracking China’s new A500 index has seen strong inflows in the two weeks since their launch, showing continued momentum for interest in the new benchmark.】

item.title: 丰田在日本和中国的销量下降，混合动力车在美国实现增长
item.description: 尽管北美市场对混合动力汽车的需求强劲，但丰田汽车公司在日本和中国的销售正努力摆脱一系列挑战，包括电动汽车品牌竞争加剧、国内丑闻和海外召回。【原文：Toyota Motor Corp.’s sales in Japan and China are struggling to shake off a series of challenges, including rising competition from electric-vehicle brands, domestic scandals and recalls abroad, despite strong demand for hybrid vehicles in North America.】

item.title: 日本樱花互联网公司为数据中心项目添置 Nvidia 设备
item.description: 樱花互联网公司（Sakura Internet Inc）即将建成的数据中心在三年内投入使用时可能会被预订一空，这促使日本政府的本土网络提供商加大了对 Nvidia 公司图形处理器的采购力度。【原文：Sakura Internet Inc.’s upcoming data center will likely be fully booked by the time it comes online in three years, spurring the Japanese government’s homegrown network provider to ramp up purchases of Nvidia Corp. graphic processing units.】
